metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10087 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The kernel_wait4 function in kernel/exit.c in the Linux kernel before 4.13,when an unspecified architecture and compiler is used, might allow localusers to cause a denial of service by triggering an attempted use of the-INT_MIN value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required
